sentence: Malawi 's Transport Minister Henry Mussa , his Mozambican counterpart Antonio Munguambe and the Zambian envoy to Malawi Joshua Mweemba signed the memorandum on behalf of the three governments at a ceremony held in the Malawian capital Lilongwe .
sentence_bolded: Malawi 's Transport Minister Henry Mussa , his Mozambican counterpart Antonio Munguambe and the Zambian envoy to Malawi Joshua Mweemba signed the memorandum on behalf of the three governments at a ceremony held in the Malawian capital Lilongwe .
